website_summaries.verdict: The LSTN Troubadours sound fantastic, which helps you forget about their uncomfortable fit.
pros: Excellent audio performance with crisp highs, rich lows, and no distortion
Inline microphone and remote control for mobile devices

customer_reviews.title: said they are very comfortable AND (most importantly)
customer_reviews.text: so, I took a chance on this gift for my husband (who can be picky) and he really likes these headphones. He loves the look of them, said they are very comfortable AND (most importantly), he said the sound quality is great. He's very impressed and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but people with long hair watch out!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the sound, they're beautiful, well constructed, cord is nice and long. Im disappointed that the mic doesn't have volume controls (I wish this would have been in the product description), you can upgrade to a cord w volume controls via their website for roughly $8. Only major complaint is the little round discs on the size adjusters rips your hair out EVERY TIME I wear them. - people with hair over an inch long you've been warned!
customer_reviews.author: BCH

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best sounding headphones I have tried. These are the only ones I would buy.
customer_reviews.author: AtaSar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality so good it feels like you're in the booth with the artist/band. Compliments with every use!
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my wife. She loves the headphones!
customer_reviews.author: John Harding

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel of these headphones. They fit better and are more comfortable than my bose headphones.The sound is crisp and clear. Would recommend them to anyone looking for a good pair of headphones in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: krzysamm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my boyfriend, and he loves them! They are virtually sound proof, which is great as well. They offer great sound quality. My boyfriend's taste in music is either rap or rock and he loves how the clear they sound. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Smith

customer_reviews.title: I am an college athlete and I would not recommend this for major busy athletes because of the material
customer_reviews.text: I am an college athlete and I would not recommend this for major busy athletes because of the material, the plastic seems it can wear off within 5months. Also, the wires are annoying unless you wrap them up correctly for you, but otherwise if not an athlete or busy I would rate this a 5 star in the wired headphone category. Quality of headphone would be somewhere between Sole republics & skull candy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas and we were both blown away by the quality and sound of these head phones! They are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Chance

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality for a ridiculously fair price - with a company that has an amazing cause!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my husband these for Christmas...he LOOOVES the quality of the sound, the noise isolation is game changing for him to work at home enjoyably, and the look is really amazing quality. This was a total score of a find, and you really cannot beat the price for the quality! Oh, and I will spend money 10 times over with a company that gives back the way LSTN does. For every pair purchased, they help restore someone's hearing. LOVE this.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality!! They buy a deaf person hearing aids with the purchase of these headphones which is another great reason to buy it. The headphones are definitely worth their price
customer_reviews.author: PSM

product_meta.title: LSTN Troubadours Cherry Wood On-Ear Headphones with in-line Microphone
feature_bullets: LSTN noise-isolating headphones are handcrafted from real wood, and electro-acoustically tuned to produce high-end sound quality at any volume.
LSTN real wood headphones feature an in-line microphone for ease of use with answering and ending calls, voice recording, and skipping tracks during playback.
Detachable, nylon-wrapped dual input cable. Our headphone cables are fully compatible with iOS and Android devices.

Troubadour headphones are built with an adjustable lightweight metal headband for extreme headphone durability and functionality. Luxuriously padded, faux-leather ear cushions are designed for maximum comfort and noise-isolation without the use of batteries.
All LSTN headphones include a drawstring carrying bag to help keep you traveling in style and your headphones looking like-new.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars38 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
